response.job_title: Field Sales Representative - Google Cloud Platform
response.summary: Integral and high performance professional with experience in selling, consulting and design IT solutions, recognize results in hardware pre-sales, cloud sales and customer experience across retail and financial sectors. Considered as a proactive person focused on customer business success through consultative selling. Systems engineer from the National University of Colombia with emphasis on complex systems (cognitive and evolutionary computing) in addition master classes in Contemporary Strategic Management and Power in organizations.
response.skills: SQL, Power Systems, Solution Architecture, Cloud Computing, Business Intelligence, Unix, Storage Systems, IT Strategy, Venta de soluciones, Sales, Evolutionary Computation, Requirements Analysis, Business Analysis, Database Design, Integration, Repository Management, Java, Arquitectura de soluciones, Integración, Computación en la nube

profile_positions.description: Responsible for the greenfield territory in enterprise accounts, with three new logos in each of the last two quarters, giving important numbers for the region and with a healthy pipeline for the coming months, despite the restriction of remote work and its challenges in accounts  no installed base or competition with great results

company.name: Google
company.description:
A problem isn't truly solved until it's solved for all. Googlers build products that help create opportunities for everyone, whether down the street or across the globe. Bring your insight, imagination and a healthy disregard for the impossible. Bring everything that makes you unique. Together, we can build for everyone.

Check out our career opportunities at careers.google.com.
